title: Home Fires: Episode 4 Preview Masterpiece
text: In the fourth episode, the women struggle to recover from past and present mistakes. Episode 4 of Home Fires airs Sunday, October 25 at 8/7c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #HomeFiresPBS
